getStartedDescription: An application that will help you monitor the working time.
getStartedLanguage: Please select the language you speak.
loginDescription: Enter your login code to continue to the GiveJobTimer.
tokenIsCorrect: The token you entered is correct.
redirectToCoordinatorRegistration: Now, you will be redirected to the COORDINATOR registration form.
redirectToEmployeeRegistration: Now, you will be redirected to the EMPLOYEE registration form.
loginCodeWillBeDisplayed: After successful registration, a special login code will be displayed, please remember it.
pressButtonToChooseInterestedDocument: Press button to choose interested document
basicSectionDescription: This section contains very basic information about you like name, surname and nationality.
name: Name
contactSectionDescription: To be in touch, please provide one of the three forms of contact.
termsOfUseIsRequired: Accept regulations and privacy policy to complete registration.
seeDocumentsHint: To view the documents, click on the link below.
acceptRegulationsIsRequired: Confirmation of the regulations is required.
acceptPrivacyPolicyIsRequired: Confirmation of the privacy policy is required.
oneOfThreeContactsIsRequired: Please provide one of the three forms of contact.
registerSuccess: Registration went successfully. Now you can sign in with login code.
exitRegistrationContent: Are you sure u want to exit from registration form?
contactWithUsByGivenEmail: Contact with us by given email!
logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to log out?
workplaceWrongLength: Workplace cannot contain more than 200 characters
areYouSureYouWantToDeleteSelectedWorkpla: Are you sure you want to delete selected workplaces?
noWorkplacesHint:
You seem to have no workplaces added.
Select the button at the bottom of the screen to add some workplaces.
startTimeConfirmation: Are you sure you want to start work at workplace of number
enterWorkplaceCodePopupTitle: Enter workplace code to begin work
workplaceCodeIsCorrect: The workplace code you entered is CORRECT
workplaceCodeIsCorrectNd: You can start your work from now!
workplaceCodeIsIncorrect: Passed workplace code is not correct
hintPressBtnToStart: Hint: Press start button then enter workplace code to begin work
hintPressBtnToPause: Hint: Press pause button to finish your work
pauseWorkConfirmation: Are you sure you want to STOP your work?
noDaysWorkedOfCurrentEmployee: Current employee has no days worked yet
needToSelectWorkTimes: You need to select work times
areYouSureYouWantToDeleteSelectedWorkTim: Are you sure you want to delete selected work times?
noDaysWorkedInCurrentWorkplace: Current workplace has no days worked yet
cannotDeleteWorkplaceWhenSomeoneWorkingT: You cannot delete selected workplaces because some employees are currently working in places with the code you want to delete.
yourAccountProbablyExpired: Your account probably expired. You can contact administrator for more info.
newVersionOfApp: A new version of GiveJob is available!
prompt: Please update the application as some functionalities may not work with your current version.
someOfSelectedEmployeesAreInWork: Some of selected employees are in work.
someOfSelectedEmployeesAreNotInWork: Some of selected employees are not in work.
ifYouWantToStartWorkPleaseFirstStopTheir: If you want to start work, please uncheck wrong employees or stop their work first
ifYouWantToStopWorkPleaseFirstStartTheir: If you want to stop work, please uncheck wrong employees or start their work first
chooseWorkplaceWhereSelectedEmployeesWil: Choose workplace where selected employees will start to work
goToWorkplacesSectionAndAddSomeWorkplace: Go to workplaces section and add some workplaces
workHasBeenStartedSuccessfullyForSelecte: Work has been started successfully for selected employees
pauseWorkForSelectedEmployeesConfirmatio: Are you sure you want to stop work for selected employees?
workHasBeenStoppedSuccessfullyForSelecte: Work has been successfully stopped for selected employees
setWorkTimeForSelectedEmployees: Set work time for selected employees
givenValueIsNotANumber: Given value is not a number
timeOfStartCannotStartLaterThanFinish: Time of starting work cannot start later than time of finishing work
workingTimeHasBeenSuccessfullySetForSele: Working time has been successfully set for selected days and employees
ifYouWantToFillTimeManuallyPleaseFirstSt: If you want to fill time manually, please first stop their work
youWantToAddToGroup: you want to add to the group
groupNameExists: Group name is in use by another group
groupNameForDeleteInvalid: Provided group name does not equal real group name
successfullyDeletedGroup: The selected group was successfully deleted
youWantToRemoveFromGroup: you want to remove from the group
groupNameNeedToBeUnique: Provided group name is currently in use, please select another name
groupNameWrongLength: Group name length cannot be higher than 26
groupDescriptionWrongLength: Group description length cannot be higher than 100
loggedSuccessButNoGroups: You have successfully logged in but it looks like you don't have created groups. To create a group, please select the button at the bottom of the screen.
noEmployeesToAddForSelectedGroup: No employees to add for selected group because all employees are already in this group
